dcterms:description: A neural TTS-only dataset with crowdsourced naturalness MOS evaluations, consisting of 20K TTS audio files generated with the LJ Speech voice from several Tacotron-like acoustic models and an LPCNet vocoder.
dcterms:title: SOMOS

dcterms:creator: Tiago H. Falk
Sebastian M¨oller
Vasilis Karaiskos
Simon King
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes synthetic speech utterances produced by many synthesizers and the corresponding listeners’ scores, used for improving instrumental quality prediction performance.
dcterms:title: Blizzard Challenge (BC)

dcterms:creator: Jaime Lorenzo-Trueba

dcterms:description: A dataset that promotes the development of parallel and nonparallel methods for voice conversion, used in the Voice Conversion Challenge.
dcterms:title: Voice Conversion Challenge (VC Challenge)

dcterms:creator: Keith Ito
Linda Johnson
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of speech recordings used for training and evaluating text-to-speech systems.
dcterms:title: LJ Speech Dataset
